update captcha_sms
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
captcha = #{captcha,jdbcType=CHAR},
expires_time = #{expiresTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
validate_count = #{validateCount,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update captcha_sms set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, captcha = #{captcha,jdbcType=CHAR}, expires_time = #{expiresTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, validate_count = #{validateCount,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from captcha_sms where phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc limit 1

select
from captcha_sms where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and expires_time < #{maxExpiresTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select
from captcha_sms where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and expires_time < #{maxExpiresTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and is_checked = false and is_used = false
